ABOUT ME

I started my life loving science. All things science; physics, math, biology, quantum physics (I count music as a science). I went to school and completed a B.A. in Natural Science, then found out that I didn't like lab work very much (so lonely!). No Regrets! All was well. I still loved science and now I knew more.

Then, my sister wrote a book and I helped edit it. I also Wordpress and created her website. It took 6 weeks and my eyes needed a good soak after, but I loved working on it. It now only exists on the Wayback Machine right HERE.

When DoSpace offered a class in CSS & HTML, I signed up. If I did another website, I didn't want it to take six weeks again! Well, I fell in love and started learning everything I could about web design and full stack development.

  • HTML5/CSS
  • Sass
  • JavaScript
  • Greensock
  • React.js
  • RESTful APIs
  • Express.js
  • NODE.js
  • SQL
  • Git
  • Redux.js
  • RTK
  • Agile Methodologies
  • MyPHP

2021 October

DoSpace

Javascript Class

Five week in-person class on the basics of Javascript and form authentication. I took the class to improve my understanding of JS. It was my second time taking the class and I was able to pick up things I did not know before. The perspective of the class different every time.
